topic.title: Example 1 - Read Custom-Formatted Data from HDFS

body.p: The sample code makes the following assumptions.

ul.li: The data is contained in HDFS directory /demo/data/temp and the name node is running on port 8081.
This code writes the data in Greenplum Database format to /demo/data/MRTest1 on HDFS.

The data contains the following columns, in order.
A long integer
A Boolean
A text string
